fields.name: Identify phishing email
fields.description: Analyze the suspicious email to verify phishing indicators, such as spoofed sender, malicious links, and content inconsistencies.

fields.name: Isolate affected accounts
fields.description: Temporarily disable the userâ€™s account or restrict access to minimize potential impact while the investigation proceeds.

fields.name: Conduct forensics on email
fields.description: Perform a forensic analysis of the email, identifying payloads, attachments, or URLs that may be malicious.

fields.name: Notify affected users
fields.description: Notify all potentially affected users about the phishing attack, providing guidance on what actions to take (e.g., password change).

fields.name: Identify copyright infringement
fields.description: Verify the validity of the copyright infringement claim by analyzing the reported content or material.

fields.name: Notify the alleged infringer
fields.description: Contact the user or entity accused of infringement to inform them of the complaint and request resolution.

fields.name: Evaluate legal actions
fields.description: Consult with the legal team to evaluate the potential legal implications and decide on further actions.

fields.name: Remove infringing content
fields.description: Remove or restrict access to the infringing content if the claim is verified and the issue remains unresolved.
